decision_conditions: <p>Cycle storage&nbsp;</p><p>Prior to the first occupation of the development, &nbsp;details of the facilities for cyclists including the cycle storage areas and how access is gained to the storage facilities, stand type and spacing shall be submitted to and approved by the council. Such details as approved shall be implemented prior to the first occupation of the development and shall thereafter be retained and maintained.</p><p>REASON: To ensure the proposal meets sustainable transport objectives.</p>

<p>Refuse strategy&nbsp;</p><p>Prior to occupation of the development hereby approved, a refuse strategy shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority. Refuse collection shall only be carried out in accordance with the details approved, unless otherwise agreed in writing by the local planning authority.</p><p>REASON: To ensure there are adequate refuse/ recycling storage facilities at the building.</p>

<p>Any building permitted to be used as a dwellinghouse by virtue of Class MA is to remain in use as a dwellinghouse within the meaning of Class C3 of Schedule 1 to the Use Classes Order and for no other purpose, except to the extent that the other purpose is ancillary to the use as a dwellinghouse.&nbsp;</p><p>REASON: To comply with the requirements of MA.2. - (1)(6).</p>

The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this permission.


REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

The Development hereby permitted shall only be carried out and completed strictly in accordance with the submitted plans hereby approved and any subsequent approval of details.


REASON: To ensure that the development hereby permitted is carried out in full accordance with the plans hereby approved.
description: Prior Approval (Class MA) for change of use from office (Class E) to self contained flat (Class C3).
